question: 静か
sourceMnemonic: This is the <ja>な</ja> adjective form of <kanji>quiet</kanji>, which is kind of just like the noun, anyways. What is the adjective version of quiet? It's also <vocabulary>quiet</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: You need to be <vocabulary>quiet</vocabulary>. <reading>She's</reading> (<ja>しず</ja>) being nice and quiet, unlike you!
